title: 88 down under
creator_credit: Karl McPhee, Paul Humfress and Film Australia
brief_description: A promotional film for the Bicentenary celebrations which sets out to show the diversity of Australia, its history, wealth, cities, tourist attractions and above all its people and their achievements. Narrated in the style of the Paul Hogan tourist commercials.
